channel.title: How do I make a monster appear?!
channel.description: I have tried to make a giant rat turn into a greater demon and it logged the transform in a table but nothing seemed to happen!! :mad: :confused: if someone could tell me how to make monsters appear or transform that would be helpful. Thanks :D. :rolleyes:

item.title: How do I make a monster appear?!
item.dc:creator: @malganis malganis
item.description:
@malganis wrote:

 Well once I tried tekeporting to somewhere ... I came out in total blackness

I need like a map of cordinates to help me out of this one! :(:eek:

Plus I cant find what program to open that document with
It also needs to be edited so i cant use notepad
adding in an app with the capabillity of doing that would help me a lot
thanks agian.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a monster appear?!

item.title: How do I make a monster appear?!
item.dc:creator: @Narbscape Narbscape
item.description:
@Narbscape wrote:

Making monsters transform??

Well to spawn monsters go into autospawn.CFG and look for the monster you want, make sure coords are right, and change the monster id to be whatever you want it to be. 2745 for jad etc…

Read full topic
